word: When the Lord warned His people against making Battle Creek a Jerusalem center, and said that plants should be made in many places, He meant just what He said. The large patronage of the Sanitarium is no sign that this institution should have been built up in its present magnificence. [WRITTEN IN AUGUST, 1903, SUBSEQUENT TO THE ERECTION OF THE NEW SANITARIUM BUILDING FOLLOWING THE FIRE OF 1902.] Even though it had many more patients, this would be no evidence in this matter.
